Class: BlobUtils

BlobUtils

BlobUtils is a portable, cross-browser utility library for working with Blob instances. See Blob.

new BlobUtils()

Source:
  • WebSocket-debug.js, line 2590

Methods

<static> asBinaryString(callback, blob) → {void}

Reads a string from a Blob and passes it as a parameter to the specified callback function. Each character in the resulting string has a character code equal to the unsigned byte value of the corresponding byte in the Blob.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback function
blob Blob
Source:
  • WebSocket-debug.js, line 2705
Returns:
Type
void

<static> asNumberArray(callback, blob) → {void}

Read an Array of JavaScript Numbers from a Blob instance and passes it as a parameter to the specified callback function. Each Number is an integer in the range 0..255 equal to the value of the corresponding byte in the Blob.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
callback function
blob Blob
Source:
  • WebSocket-debug.js, line 2634
Returns:
Type
void

<static> asString(blob, start, end) → {String}

Reads a UTF-8 string from a Blob. The start and end arguments can be used to subset the Blob.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
blob Blob
start Number optional
end Number optional
Source:
  • WebSocket-debug.js, line 2600
Returns:
the decoded string
Type
String
